title: SmartFace
summary: A Smart WatchFace with Smart Utilities like VoiceRecorder, Music Controls etc.
description: SmartFace - The Glowing Watch with Full Customisations.           ★  Set Any Colour you like (16M Colours).           ★  Create your own Solid Colour or Linear Gradient or Radial Gradient OR choose from presets.           ★  Create your own Watch Faces.SmartUtilities           ★  Call Log & Favourite Contacts :  Direct Call, Call Reject and Call Volume Control                                                                     Set your favourite contacts and call directly from the watch.           ★  SMS                                         :   View SMS or set your favourite SMS App to open.           ★  VoiceRecorder                         :   Record voice and play it directly* in the watch.           ★  Weather                                   :   5 day / 3 hour forecast           ★  Fitness                                     :   Show current step counter. Set you favourite app to open.           ★  Music Controls                         :   Control you music play.                                                                       Play-Pause,                                                                       Next-Previous Track                                                                      Volume Control* Note: To Play The Recorded File Your Watch MUST HAVE A Speaker.
descriptionHTML:
SmartFace - The Glowing Watch with Full Customisations.
★ Set Any Colour you like (16M Colours).
★ Create your own Solid Colour or Linear Gradient or Radial Gradient OR choose from presets.
★ Create your own Watch Faces.

SmartUtilities
★ Call Log & Favourite Contacts : Direct Call, Call Reject and Call Volume Control
Set your favourite contacts and call directly from the watch.
★ SMS : View SMS or set your favourite SMS App to open.
★ VoiceRecorder : Record voice and play it directly* in the watch.
★ Weather : 5 day / 3 hour forecast
★ Fitness : Show current step counter. Set you favourite app to open.
★ Music Controls : Control you music play.
Play-Pause,
Next-Previous Track
Volume Control



* Note: To Play The Recorded File Your Watch MUST HAVE A Speaker.
comments: All in all a good watch faces, but with the new update I don't like that you can't customize the colors and it has a stupid ui and it freezes and you can't customize it. Definitely needs more work with the new ui in custom settings!
I'm not understanding why when you go into settings to configure nothing changes you can't change the color or anything why is that
Can't change color or choose between Celsius and Fahrenheit  because there is not a settings icon.
Works well on Samsung S7 Edge, great work guys.
Well made!  Thank you for a great product
Like the watch face but it drains my battery
recentChanges: Bug Fix : Crash when SMS received.
